mapper.insert: INSERT INTO soccer_match_recruitment(start_time, end_time, set_number, set_time, stadium_id, club1_id, club2_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{setNumber}, #{setTime}, #{stadiumId}, #{club1Id}, #{club2Id}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT start_time, end_time, set_number, set_time, stadium_id, club1_id, club2_id, created_at, updated_at FROM soccer_match_recruitment WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT start_time, end_time, set_number, set_time, stadium_id, club1_id, club2_id, created_at, updated_at FROM soccer_match_recruitment WHERE clu1_id = #{clubId} OR club2_id = #{clubId}
mapper.update: UPDATE soccer_match_recruitment SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, set_number = #{setNumber}, set_time = #{setTime}, stadium_id = #{stadiumId}, updated_at=now() WHERE id = #{id}
